short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for open your bookmarks in new tabs with the customizable list view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension that change your new tab into new start page with list of your bookmarks.
With nice and clear layout design, you can access and open your bookmark more easily. Also has room for you to adjust your layout for your own perference.

Remark: This extension is created only for educational/learning purpose. it is no subject for any commercial intentions/purposes.
